page.title: 14 RELIGION IN KENNINGTON
page.content: There are two churches in the Kenning- ton area.{ST MARY'S OF KENNINGTON which is part of the{CHURCH OF ENGLAND and{KENINGTON UNITED REFORMED METHOD- {IST CHURCH,}also a hall belonging to {ST. MARY'S CHURCH.}Services at {ST.MARY'S CHURCH}are 7.35am Daily Matins. On Sundays at 8.30am Holy Communion, 10.00am Sung Eucharist. 8am Tuesdays to Thursdays Holy Communion, 11.30am Sunday School. The clergy are Reverend Neville Gallagher and Reverend Kurt Wittwer. The {UNITED {REFORMED METHODIST CHURCH }services are: 10am last Sunday of every month (Family Service). There are various organizations run by this church, Tuesdays 'Welcome Club' 2.30pm, Wednesday 'Friendship Circle' 7.30pm, Thursday 'Mother and toddler's Club' 2-3.00, Boy's Brigade 6pm. The clergy are RV.John Larkin & Rv.Rihard Davis.
